mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.pic, u.created_at, u.uid, u.nm, COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) AS feedCount, COUNT(DISTINCT ff.from_user_id, ff.to_user_id) AS followingCount, COUNT(DISTINCT tf.from_user_id, tf.to_user_id) AS followerCount, MAX(DISTINCT if(tf.from_user_id = #{signedUserId}, 1, 0)) + MAX(DISTINCT if(ff.from_user_id = #{signedUserId}, 2, 0)) AS followState FROM user u LEFT JOIN feed f ON f.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_follow ff ON ff.from_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user_follow tf ON tf.from_user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = #{profileUserId}
